website_content.content:
[Content truncated]... film executives in the world, from all different backgrounds. But they all have one thing in common—they're all terrified of Ronan Farrow. He's coming for you!"
Farrow, son of Mia Farrow, worked a number of exposés on Harvey Weinstein's sexual misconduct. Disgraced movie producer Weinstein was last February sentenced to 16 years in prison after he was found guilty of committing sex crimes in Los Angeles County. He has been ordered to serve the sentence on the completion of his 23-year term behind bars from his sexual assault conviction in New York.
During his Golden Globes speech, Gervis stated that "everyone's watching Netflix" over movies at theaters. After mocking the Golden Globes broadcast, Gervis advised viewers to switch off and watch his Netflix comedy, Afterlife.
Remember Hollywood elites' nervous laughter at the Oscars when Ricky Gervais joked about the Epstein list?Now we all know why. This is glorious. pic.twitter.com/eJ4paSo2wV
"You can binge watch the entire first season of Afterlife," he told the audience. "That's a show about a man who wants to kill himself after his wife dies of cancer. It has a second season though, so he obviously doesn't kill himself in the end—just like Jeffrey Epstein."
As laughs and gasps were heard coming from the well-heeled attendees gathered at the Beverly Hilton, Gervais quipped: "I know he's your friend. But I don't care."
Relentless Podcast host Kyle Becker shared the clip on X, late Wednesday, where as of press time it has garnered more than 6 million views. Becker erroneously labeled Gervais' speech as having taken place at the Oscars.
"Remember Hollywood elites' nervous laughter at the Oscars when Ricky Gervais joked about the Epstein list?" Becker wrote. "Now we all know why. This is glorious."
The footage included cutaways to such audience members as Cate Blanchett, who was named in the unsealed documents, and a seemingly shocked Tom Hanks, who for some time has been falsely tied to Epstein on social media.
In recent years, a faction of social media users have pushed the theory that several celebrities and public figures—often known to be Democrats—flew to Epstein's private Caribbean island, Little St. James.
Epstein's private jet, which was used to transport guests to the island, was derisively called the "Lolita Express" by certain media...[Content truncated]

It generally employs professional journalists and fact-checkers; however, it has faced criticism in the past for publishing sensational headlines. While it provides many reliable articles, users should remain cautious and cross-reference information with other reputable sources.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: The article discusses a viral video but does not specifically verify or dismiss the claim related to the Epstein island connection. It focuses more on a comedian's comments about Epstein, offering little direct evidence related to the viral video itself.

website_quality_evaluation.justification: Twitter is a social media platform where users can share information quickly. While it can be a source for breaking news, the open nature of the platform means that misinformation and unverified claims can spread widely. Users need to exercise substantial caution and critical thinking when evaluating the accuracy of claims made on Twitter.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This evidence is a tweet from Jimmy Kimmel denying any association with Epstein. It does not address the specifics of the claim about the viral video or its connection to Epstein’s island activities.

**Claim:**
A viral video shared in January 2023 authentically shows young girls in a house on Jeffrey Epstein's island.
**Rating:**
]
Rating: Unfounded
On Jan. 4, 2024, a video was  on X (formerly Twitter), allegedly showing "very young girls" in a house on the island of the late, convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. "One of hundreds of videos of the girls from the interior of Epstein's island," one of the Spanish-language posts  the viral video. As of this writing, one post with the in-question video gained more than 1.5 million views on X.
!

metatags.og:description: Epstein Barr virus (EBV) is a double-stranded DNA virus that infects B lymphocyte cells. It is in the herpesvirus family and was discovered in 1964.[1][2] It can cause a variety of diseases and is spread mainly from saliva containing virus-infected epithelial cells.[1][3] Close to 95% of adults throughout the world have been infected with EBV.[2] It is a causative agent of infectious mononucleosis. Treatment is generally supportive care.[1]
metatags.og:title: Epstein-Barr Virus
metatags.dc.title: Epstein-Barr Virus

website_content.content:
[Content truncated]... management strategies reserved for hemodynamically stable patients. Another non-surgical management option is splenic artery embolization. The surgical option is splenectomy which requires post-operative immunizations, antibiotics, and close follow-up.]
Another complication of infectious mononucleosis from EBV is airway obstruction from tonsillar edema of the pharyngeal tissues. Treatment of airway obstruction includes steroids, tracheotomy, or intubation. Airway obstruction is a rare (1-3.5% of cases) but an important complication of infectious mononucleosis that occurs mostly in children.]]]
Acute acalculous cholecystitis is a complication that can be treated conservatively with pain medication and antiemetics.]] In some cases, patients elected to have laparoscopic cholecystectomy due to unbearable abdominal pain.]
There are many other complications from Epstein Barr virus infection that can occur, such as myocarditis, encephalitis, hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis, pancreatitis, and autoimmune hemolytic anemia.]]]] EBV has also been implicated in causing lymphomas and nasopharyngeal cancers.]
Deterrence and Patient Education
--------------------------------
Infected patients should avoid sharing utensils, drinks, and kissing others since EBV is transmitted through saliva.]
Patients in sports should be cleared by a clinician before resuming activities. A minimum of three weeks and full resolution of splenomegaly is standard to decrease the risk of splenic rupture.]
Enhancing Healthcare Team Outcomes
----------------------------------
Patients with EBV infection should be under the care of an interprofessional team including primary clinicians, nurses, and pharmacists to improve outcomes. As shown in a prospective study done by Rea et al., symptoms can last for several months (Level 5).] Patients should be instructed on what symptoms to expect and for how long to expect them to last. They should be aware of possible complications and when to seek help. Patients who participate in sports need medical clearance and a minimum of three weeks before returning to activities to reduce the risk of splenic rupture.]

I think it’s fair to say that Katt Williams is a living legend in the comedy world, But he’s also a lightening rod for controversy. The numbers he garnered on talk show host Shannon Sharpe’s Club Shay Shay has since reached 40 Million in views and 1.2 Million in likes alone. Katt has that “it factor” whatever it is, He’s got it and I’m not just saying that because he’s from the buckeye state like myself, I’m saying it because it’s true. Katt is an incredibly talented man that deserves his flowers while he’s here. But I have to be honest as of late, he’s gotten me distracted with his viral video and don’t get me wrong, I am enjoying Katt exposing the truth on all of his peers in comedy like Cedric the entertainer; Kevin Hart; Rickey Smiley and Steve Harvey to name a few. Only to hear each and every one of them taking to social media to tell Katt to stop being angry and bitter at their success.” Mind you, not one of them refuted Katt’s claims of Kevin allegedly being an industry plant or Cedric stealing Katt’s and comedian Mark Curry’s jokes. To say that entertainment is a cut throat business is putting it lightly.” But I guess all is fair in hate and comedy.” And I especially liked the fact that Katt has taken his pettiness with Kevin Hart to Rapper 50 Cent sized proportions.” By currently teaming up with Kevin Hart’s ex wife, Torrei Hart to go on tour with him and have her open for him. Despite the fact that some backlash started to hit Torrei for supposedly being disloyal to her Ex Kevin. My personal belief on that is that Torrei doesn’t owe anyone an explanation when it comes to business matters. Kevin never once took her out on tour with him when he was married to her and Torrei has been in the comedy world as a writer and standup comic for many years. At any rate, I wish she and Katt the very...[Content truncated]

Saturday, July 27, 2024

Weekly Wrap: Misinformation Around Jeffrey Epstein Documents, Japan Quake & More
Weekly Wrap: Misinformation Around Jeffrey Epstein Documents, Japan Quake & More
================================================================================
Written By 
January 6, 2024
0
(blob:https://newschecker.in/2ce496c5eb8a85c92c3b8a2bb8391f23)]
### Authors
(blob:https://newschecker.in/3d7e3536fb2191eecfa4af1023c9b129)]
##### 
From the unsealing of court documents related to a lawsuit tied to alleged sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein, known for associating with celebrities, politicians, and billionaires, to the major earthquake that shook Japan on New Year’s day, social media saw a spate of false claims in the first week of 2024. Here are the top five fact-checks of the past week by Newschecker.
!(blob:https://newschecker.in/1f407e4bd90021f5369ae25fb43ffc20)
**Video Claiming To Show Attack On Masood Azhar Is From November 2023 Attack On Cops In Pakistan’s Dera Ismail Khan**  
Several social media handles, on January 1, 2023, claimed that JeM chief and one of India’s most wanted terrorists, Masood Azhar, was killed in an explosion in Bhawalpur while returning from the mosque. Newschecker  that the viral video shows an explosion that took place in Dera Ismail Khan on November 3, 2023. The image that went viral claiming to show Masood Azhar actually shows Pakistani religious scholar Maulana Muhammad Amin who was injured in an attack in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, and there is no evidence to link him to JeM.
!(blob:https://newschecker.in/1f407e4bd90021f5369ae25fb43ffc20)
**Tom Hanks Fled to Israel After Epstein Docs Release? No, Old Video Of Actor Dancing In Rabbi Attire Shared With False Claim**  
Several social media users shared a video, claiming that Hollywood actor Tom Hanks converted to Judaism and fled to Israel following the release of the Epstein client list. Newschecker  that the viral video shows Hanks singing and dancing to the 1995 R&B hit “This Is How We Do It” at a Jewish wedding reception in Whistler, Canada,...[Content truncated]

website_quality_evaluation.justification: Newschecker.in is a fact-checking platform focused on verifying claims made in news and social media. It emphasizes transparency and strives to maintain high standards in its evaluations. While generally reliable, its effectiveness can sometimes depend on the thoroughness of the investigation for each claim.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: Although it mentions misinformation regarding Epstein, it does not specifically address the claim about the video or provide any relevant evidence linking it to Epstein.

website_content.content:
*   Names of more than 150 of Jeffrey Epstein's associates being unsealed
*   Former Presidents Bill Clinton and Donald Trump are mentioned in the documents
*   Expert says new charges against named individuals are unlikely
Updated: Jan 5, 2024 / 01:55 PM CST
__
() — More than  were released Wednesday night from the investigation and trials surrounding former billionaire .
A federal court began releasing previously secret documents Wednesday related to Epstein that disclose the names of more than 150 people associated with the disgraced financier who killed himself in 2019 while awaiting trial on sex trafficking charges.
The documents are being unsealed on a rolling basis, with two being held back until at least Jan 22. The records may include the names of those who worked for Epstein or only had weak ties to the financier as well as potential victims and witnesses. Appearing in the documents does not mean someone is connected to any wrongdoing.
The names of those mentioned so far in the documents range from politicians to Hollywood actors, including some of the nation’s most rich and powerful.
Among those named in the initial documents include , former President Donald Trump, Michael Jackson, David Copperfield, Leonardo DiCaprio and Cameron Diaz.
Many of the names belong to people who had already been publicly connected to Epstein as his long-time associates or friends, including his former lawyer Alan Dershowitz who was mentioned in the documents 137 times. Dershowitz pushed hard for all of the court documents to be released to clear his name.
It’s imperative to note the list does not imply that everyone is accused of wrongdoing or illegal and immoral behavior.
The documents come from a settled civil lawsuit that Virginia Giuffre, who alleges she was a victim of sex trafficking, filed against 
The Miami Herald has been fighting to unseal documents filed as part of that lawsuit since 2018. The legal battle came to a head in December when

website_quality_evaluation.justification: News Nation is a relatively new news organization aiming to provide straightforward news coverage. It is building its reputation and while it offers informative content, it lacks the extensive history and established credibility of long-standing outlets. It's important to approach its content with a level of scrutiny.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This evidence discusses associates named in the unsealed documents related to Epstein but does not provide credible evidence regarding the viral video or its contents.

metatags.og:description: 142.2K likes, 1997 comments. “Cameron Diaz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Bruce Willis were not named in Jeffrey Epstein's associated list. So why are people claiming this? These famous faces were mentioned in court files released on 4 January as part of a defamation lawsuit against Ghislane Maxwell, but only when one abuse victim, Johanna Sjoberg, was asked if she met the following celebrities. Ms Sjoberg answered no.”

website_quality_evaluation.justification: TikTok is a platform for short video content and has become a popular source for information. However, its informal nature, focus on entertainment, and lack of verification processes mean that misinformation can spread rapidly. Users should be very skeptical of claims made without supporting evidence.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This TikTok video does not provide any pertinent information regarding the claim about the Epstein connection linked to the viral video, making it irrelevant.
